GSD.product_version: versions from v5.19 to before v5.19.4
GSD.description:
net: dsa: felix: suppress non-changes to the tagging protocol

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.19.4 by commit 8e432f157c3edc5a97a7244c666589a438f5e4d4, it was introduced in version v5.19 by commit 7a29d220f4c0745a6d435dbd53c659fbde4998b6. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: net: dsa: felix: suppress non-changes to the tagging protocol
